General.Name: Top Energy Shanxi Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Top Energy Company Ltd.Shanxi engages in the thermal power generation, power transmission, and distribution business in China. The company operates through Thermal Power Generation, Power Grid Distribution, and Other segments. Top Energy Company Ltd.Shanxi was founded in 1992 and is based in Taiyuan, China.
